snippet.title: Crazy Machines PSVR TRAILER
snippet.description:
Crazy Machines will receive a physical release on October 18th through Perp Games.

For the first time, play as the professor himself and work your way through five chapters, with challenges, trophies and unique settings 

For more information, visit Perpgames.com/crazy-machines

#CrazyMachines #VR #PSVR
